ROLE: Product Analyst/Agile Business Analyst
LOCATION: Hybrid in NYC
JOB DESCRIPTION
Position Summary: We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Product Analyst (Agile Business Analyst) to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will bridge the gap between business needs and technical solutions, ensuring that our agile E-mobility incentive projects align with business goals and deliver maximum value.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
Requirements Documentation: Collaborate with stakeholders to assist in gathering and own documenting business requirements, ensuring clarity and completeness.
User Stories: Create and refine user stories, acceptance criteria, and ensure they are well-understood by the development team.
Agile Facilitation: Support agile ceremonies, including sprint planning, daily stand-ups, reviews, and retrospectives.
Backlog Management: Assist in prioritizing the product backlog, ensuring alignment with business objectives and stakeholder needs.
Process Improvement: Identify opportunities for process improvements and recommend solutions to enhance efficiency and productivity.
Stakeholder Communication: Act as a liaison between business stakeholders and the development team, facilitating effective communication and collaboration.
Data Analysis: Analyze data to provide insights and support decision-making processes.
Quality Assurance: Assist in defining and executing test plans to ensure deliverables meet quality standards and business requirements.

QUALIFICATIONS:
Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, or a related field.
3+ years of experience as a Product Analyst/Business Analyst/Scrum Master in an agile environment.
Strong understanding of agile methodologies (e.g., Scrum, Kanban).
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Proficiency in agile tools (e.g., Azure DevOps).
Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
